    Timeline

    NOTE: This is an overview of my CV, here is the full CV as a PDF.

    Education

    • Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, PES University, 2019
      • Major GPA: 9.51/10
      • Relevant Courses: Machine Learning, Advanced Machine Learning, Data Structures, Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Cloud Computing, Big Data, Operating Systems
    • Audited Courses at Brown University, 2022
      • Courses: Statistical Inference, Conditional Probability and Statistics, Information Theory, Computational Methods for Brain, Mind, and Behavior

    Research experience

    • Research Scholar, Serre Lab, Brown University, August 2021 - August 2023 (tentative)
      • Advisor: Dr. Thomas Serre
      • Work on understanding neural computations supporting perception to develop effective artificial intelligence and computer vision algorithms.
    • Research Assistant, PES University, August 2018 - May 2019
      • Advisor: Dr. Gowri Srinivasa
      • Real-time fine-grained action recognition framework for hand sanitization auditing, aimed at reducing Hospital Acquired Infections.
    • Research Intern, Center for Cloud Computing and Big Data, PES University, August 2017 - August 2018
      • Advisors: Dr. Sanchika Gupta, Dr. Dinkar Sitaram, Dr. KV Subramaniam
      • Machine Learning-based Analysis of Filarial lymphoedema: improved treatments prescribed to Elephantiasis patients.
      • Learning Algorithms in Static Analysis of Web Applications: reduced false positived in vulnerability detection from 73% to a mere 6.5%, using encoding, static fuzzing, and machine learning.
    • Research Intern, Crucible of Research and Innovation, PES University, May 2016 - July 2016
      • Advisor: Dr. VK Agrawal
      • Developed a low-cost blood pump to advance dialysis in rural India, and built modules used on the in-house satellite - PiSat.

    Industry experience

    • Senior Analyst, Goldman Sachs, January 2020 - August 2021
      • Algorithmic trading, high-touch, and low-touch flows.
      • Built the new Equities Trading platform.
      • Sole-ownership of the trade-enrichment module.
    • Software Engineer, Cisco Systems, August 2019 - January 2020
      • Detector for security vulnerabilities using a Gnosis safe.
      • Worked on using AI for failure prediction and analyzing sentiment for failure analysis cases for all Cisco products.
    • Software Engineering Intern, Cisco Systems, January 2019 - July 2019
      • Failure-case sentiment analysis, automation of processes and work-flows, and testing of software components.
